vague_description: A chicken farmer needs to determine the optimal number of bus and car trips to transport chickens, considering various constraints, to minimize transportation time.
detailed_description: A chicken farmer has sold his chicken and they need to be transported either by bus or by car. A bus can take \param{BusCapacity} chicken and takes \param{BusTripTime} hours per trip. A car can take \param{CarCapacity} chicken and takes \param{CarTripTime} hours per trip. There can be at most \param{MaxBusTrips} bus trips and at least \param{MinimumCarTripPercentage} of the trips must be by car. If the farmer needs to transport \param{TotalChicken} chicken, how many trips of each should be done to minimize the total time needed to transport the chicken?
target_objective: Minimize the total time needed to transport all chickens
target_constraints: Number of bus trips is non-negative
Number of car trips is non-negative
There can be at most MaxBusTrips bus trips
At least MinimumCarTripPercentage of the trips must be by car
Total number of chickens transported must be at least TotalChicken
target_parameters: Number of chicken a bus can carry
Time taken per trip by bus
Maximum number of bus trips allowed
Percentage of trips that must be by car
Number of chicken a car can carry
Time taken per trip by car
Total number of chicken to be transported
